titles.title: Expressing support for the designation "Housing America Month" and honoring the importance of affordable housing and community development programs and resources that allow communities across the country to provide access to safe, secure housing for all Americans, regardless of income level.

Expressing support for the designation "Housing America Month" and honoring the importance of affordable housing and community development programs and resources that allow communities across the country to provide access to safe, secure housing for all Americans, regardless of income level.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of`Housing America Month and honors the importance of our nation's housing and community development programs.
